description: This is a React component file ('page.tsx') that defines the main page of a weather application. It manages state, fetches weather data and locations, and renders components such as Header, Sidebar, WeatherCard, ForecastChart, and LocationsManager.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Sets the selected location based on the search query.

methods.name: handleAddLocation
methods.description: Adds a new location, optimistic update, and reverts if API call fails.

methods.name: handleRemoveLocation
methods.description: Removes a location with optimistic update and reverts if API call fails.
